channel.title: Vps available for 1 server
channel.description: Hi everyone, I currently own a vps and I pay every month I will only be running the rsps on the vps nothing else. I currently have it running ubuntu with vnc already on it. If you want debian os or anything else linux you can ask me to change it and I will consider it. JUST SEND ME A MESSAGE! That is it! Please note: You must know how to set it up on a linux vps. First to message me will be able to use my vps for no charge with one exception; If someone knows coding better than you they will likely get the vps instead but do not quote me on that. :)

I currently own a vps and I pay every month
I will only be running the rsps on the vps nothing else.
I currently have it running ubuntu with vnc already on it.
If you want debian os or anything else linux you can ask me to change it and I will consider it.
JUST SEND ME A MESSAGE!
That is it!
Please note:
You must know how to set it up on a linux vps.
First to message me will be able to use my vps for no charge with one exception;
If someone knows coding better than you they will likely get the vps instead but do not quote me on that.
:)[/quote]

item.title: Vps available for 1 server
item.dc:creator: @Advocatus Advocatus
item.description:
@Advocatus wrote:

[quote=“Codeusa12, post:11, topic:420398”][quote author=Advocatus link=topic=522954.msg3804303#msg3804303 date=1320322924]

20 years?

He never specified that it was a rsps server, also its krackid and pretty much everything he says is false.
[/quote]

rsps forum
a server
didn’t attempt to say another games server
Going with he made some bullshit up about running a RSPS longer than RS has even been online.[/quote]
Its krackkid… Everything he says is bullshit… Plus iirc he was/is involved with private servers outside of rsps.

Read full topic
